name: Commonwealth ex rel. Baxter, Appellant, v. Ashe
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Baxter v. Ashe

judges: Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearne, Jones, Bell, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth ex rel. Baxter, Appellant, v. Ashe.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order is affirmed on the opinion of the learned court below.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Henry R. Smith, Jr., Assistant District Attorney, with him William S. Rahauser, District Attorney, and Gilbert J. Helwig, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Baxter, Appellant, v. Ashe.
Argued September 26, 1951.
Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearne, Jones, Bell, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.
November 13, 1951:
G. Harold Blaxter, for appellant.
Henry R. Smith, Jr., Assistant District Attorney, with him William S. Rahauser, District Attorney, and Gilbert J. Helwig, for appellee.
